backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products and orders with CRUD-like queries and functions to add products, search/filter, and place orders while updating stock.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file and component in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using custom OKLCH palette with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for catalog, cart, checkout, and confirmation, wrapped in CartProvider and AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogF: UI controls for searching products and filtering by category using input and select components.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Displays a product’s details, price, stock, and add‑to‑cart button inside a card UI component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: High‑level layout wrapping all pages with a header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright info and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation, and a cart button displaying total cart items.
frontend/src/context/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state, persistence, and actions for adding, removing, and updating items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines product fetching and order placement hooks using the actor and React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, color variables, dark mode overrides, and catalog page background utilities.
frontend/src/lib/cartStorage.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing the shopping cart in sessionStorage with bigint serialization support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, providing React Query and Internet Identity contexts.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages cart items with quantity controls, removal, and navigation to browsing when empty.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Fetches and filters products by search and category, rendering product cards and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form submission, order placement, and redirects when the cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details by loading the last order from sessionStorage, formatting data, and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/types/cart.ts: Defines CartItem and CartState interfaces for cart data structure.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and content paths with extended custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, features, requirements, and branding assets for the Easy Provision Store app.
